content:
Hi, I am working fsh Sushi R4 profiling, I have a question on how to use a standard extension. I have a Patient Profile and I want to use 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-race' in my profile. Should I add a dependency in the sushi-config file , I have gone through the tutorial and am ale to define a custom extension but how do I re-use an extension that is being defined in another Implementation?
If I have to add a dependency, please provide the package and version as I tried few things and the tool was not able to download
